channel.title: Bilal ARSLAN's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Bilal ARSLAN's Blog

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi, I’m Bilal! I’m a computer engineer living and working in Turkey. I am addicted myself to learning.

I am an iOS developer and also interest with Python(Django) and Ruby(Rails). I learn and hack Arduino and IoT by nights.

Check out my GitHub page to see what I’ve been up to recently!

Contact

If you’d like to get in touch, you can find all my profile in my personal website
